definitions.body: 2Sa 6:13 step, pace ;—abs. [[חָָעַד]] Pr 30:29; sf.[[חַעֲדוֹ]] Je 10:3, Pr 6:9, etc.; pl. cstr. [[חַעֲדֵי]] Job 18:7; sf. [[חְעָדַי]] Job 31:4, etc.;—
lit.step, pace, 2Sa 6:13, [[תַּרְחִיב חַעֲדִי תַּחְתֵּנִי]] 2Sa 22:37 = Ps 18:37, i.e. givest me firm footing, ´[[מֵטִיבֵי ח]] Pr 30:29 = making a good step, stately in march ; La 4:18 (‖[[לָָכֶת]]).

step, steps, in fig. of course of life, fortune: sg. ´[[לאׁ יֵחַר ח]] Pr 4:12; ‖[[דֶּרֶח]] Je 10:23, Pr 16:9; Job 14:16, Job 31:4, Job 34:21, [[חַעֲדֵי אוֹנוֹ]] Job 18:7 (cf. Pr 4:12 supr.); [[מִסְפַּר־עָדַי אַגִּידֶנּוּ]] Job 31:37; of harlot Pr 5:5 fig., [[שְׁאוֹל חְעָדֶיהָ יִתְמָׂכוּ]].
